block.p: LEAD: Two comedy shows - featuring individual comics and the First Amendment Comedy and Improvisation Company - will be offered this weekend at 2 Bond Street, between Broadway and Lafayette Street. Tonight at 10:30, there will be appearances by four comedians - Bill Torres, Mike King, Judy Gold and Liz Wolynski.

LEAD: Two comedy shows - featuring individual comics and the First Amendment Comedy and Improvisation Company - will be offered this weekend at 2 Bond Street, between Broadway and Lafayette Street. Tonight at 10:30, there will be appearances by four comedians - Bill Torres, Mike King, Judy Gold and Liz Wolynski.

Two comedy shows - featuring individual comics and the First Amendment Comedy and Improvisation Company - will be offered this weekend at 2 Bond Street, between Broadway and Lafayette Street. Tonight at 10:30, there will be appearances by four comedians - Bill Torres, Mike King, Judy Gold and Liz Wolynski. Tomorrow night, also at 10:30, it will be the First Amendment troupe. Admission each night is $10. Information: 473-1472.
